name: Agoraphobia (Skyler Riggle)
description:
Description

This game was a small horror experience made for the GDA Halloween game jam 2021. In this project, we attempted to create an eerie atmosphere to place the player into an anxious horror experience. Hope you enjoy!

This game is best experienced with headphones.

Credits

Cameron Campbell - Design, Audio, Art

Skyler Riggle - Programming, Design, Art

Download Instructions

  1. Download the .zip file from this page.
  2. Unpack the .zip file once downloaded.
  3. Play the JamGame.exe file.
  4. Enjoy!
